description: The Japanese Painted Fern is an amazing species of fern that stands out with its yellow fronds that are beautifully accented with green and silver markings. This plant can bring life to any garden with its elegant and delicate look and its ability to thrive in both well-drained soils and shady spots. It is an excellent choice of fern to help create interesting texture in garden beds and it's quite disease and pest resistant. The Japanese Painted Fern is a stunning addition to any landscape, with its delicate fronds swaying in the breeze and its eye-catching yellow and silver coloring.
